AkTriggerBase
Trigger
triggerDelegate
delegate void AkTriggerBase::Trigger ( GameObject  in_gameObject  ) 

Delegate declaration for all Wwise Triggers.

Parameters:
in_gameObject in_gameObject is used to pass "Collidee" objects when Colliders are used. Some components have the option "Use other object", this is the object they'll use.
